author: samwilsn
content: I might miss the next spec sync; will be giving an update on the specs in the <#746566142700814426> meeting.

author: peter.davies
content:
Decisions made on the call (subject to <@!689161464829050960> approving):
1. After the Spurious Dragon Hardfork is added we will create a `byzantium-dev` branch so EIPs can be individual PRs rather than one massive PR.
2. I will implement Byzantium EIPS 196, 197, 198 and <@!564718359304863744> will do the rest.
3. We will not implement EIP 1283 (which was removed last minute from Constantinople), because it was never implemented on Mainnet.

author: samwilsn
content: Sounds great to me!

author: samwilsn
content: I'd also be happy with a series of PRs straight into `master`

author: peter.davies
content: The main issue is that until Byzantium is finished lots of tests will fail.

author: samwilsn
content: From the EIPIP meeting earlier today, hopefully we'll be getting some feedback from devs on how useful this is, and some ideas for structuring EIPs going forward
